cause.description:
To expand the Penn State Student Section at Beaver Stadium by more than a few percentage points. Every year thousands of students are locked out of the student section at Beaver Stadium, and there are thousands still that never have a chance to see a game during their entire time as a student. This needs to change.
1. Expand Student Section
2. Aware others of the neccessity for a bigger Student Section
3. Instill the Nittany Lion Passion for football in all that desire it.
cause.mission: Be awarded for being the best and most passionate fans there are.....We Want More Tickets and a bigger Student Section!
cause.name: Expand the Penn State Student Section
